description: Discover crypto trading pairs across supported chains on DexScreener. Fetch up-to-date pair details by chain and address, or list all pairs for a token. Speed up market research for pricing, liquidity, and new opportunities.

capabilities.name: get_top_boosted_tokens
capabilities.description: Get tokens with the most active boosts

capabilities.name: get_token_orders
capabilities.description: Get paid orders for a specific token

capabilities.name: get_pairs_by_chain_and_address
capabilities.description: Get pair data by chain and pair address

capabilities.name: get_pairs_by_token_addresses
capabilities.description: Get pairs for one or multiple token addresses

capabilities.name: search_pairs
capabilities.description: Search for trading pairs on DexScreener
